text: The 1997–98 FIBA Korać Cup was the 26th edition of the third tier European basketball tournament FIBA Korać cup and had 84 participants (42 teams played from the first round and another 42 teams from the second round). Mash Jeans Verona won the tournament. == Team allocation == The labels in the parentheses show how each team qualified for the place of its starting round: * 1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.: League position after Playoffs * WC: Wild card {| class="wikitable" style="white-space: nowrap;" |- !
